src_original: caturṇāṃ dharmoddānānāmabhidhāne kriyamāṇe tadabhidhānena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇāmabhidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati |

sarveṣāṃ saṃskārāṇām anityatāyāṃ bodhisattvānaṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nirdiṣṭamakṣayajñānaṃ pravartate |  sarveṣāṃ sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ duḥkhatāyāṃ bodhisattvānaṃ mahāsattvānāṃ rnirdiṣṭamakṣayajñānaṃ pravartate |
eteṣāṃ caturṇāṃ dharmoddānānāmabhidhāne kriyamāṇe tadabhidhānena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇāmabhidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati |
idamavocat bhagavān |  āttamanaso bhikṣavaḥ sarve ca bodhisattvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti |
ekasmin samaye bhagavān buddhaḥ sāgaranāgarājāvasathe viharati sma sārddhaṃ sārdhadvādaśaśatabhikṣūṇāṃ mahāsaṃghena bahubhiśca bodhisattvamahāsattvaiḥ
